text: Better Days () is a 2019 Hong Kong Chinese romantic crime drama movie directed by Derek Tsang and was based on the novel In His Youth, In Her Beauty by Jiu Yuexi. It stars Zhou Dongyu, Jackson Yee, Huang Jue, Wu Yue, Zhou Ye and was nominated for an Academy Award in 2021. ==Other websites== * Category:2019 romantic drama movies Category:2019 crime drama movies Category:Hong Kong romance movies Category:Hong Kong crime movies Category:Hong Kong drama movies Category:Chinese movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Derek Tsang Category:Chinese-language movies
title: Better Days (movie)
